  ITEM 5.02Departure of Directors or Certain     
  Officers; Election of Directors; Appointment   
  of Certain Officers; Compensatory              
  Arrangements of Certain Officers.(b)    On     
  August 26, 2021, Bank of America Corporation   
  (the “Corporation”) announced the retirements  
  of Anne Finucane, the Corporation’s Vice       
  Chairman, and Thomas Montag, the               
  Corporation’s Chief Operating Officer and      
  president of Global Banking and Markets, and   
  a named executive officer in the               
  Corporation’s 2021 Proxy Statement. Ms.        
  Finucane and Mr. Montag will remain in their   
  roles until the end of 2021.A copy of the      
  news release announcing these retirements is   
  attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1, and is        
  incorporated herein by reference.ITEM
